docs.snippet: This game could be a wide-open, up-and-down match.
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina coach Maradona can choose from an all-star list of forwards to place alongside Lionel Messi. If there were questions about why Gonzalo Higuain was starting, especially after a tepid performance in a narrow win over Nigeria, they were silenced Thursday with a three-goal performance in Argentina's 4-1 thrashing of South Korea to take control of Group B.
docs.abstract: This game could be a wide-open, up-and-down match.
